Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

This is with reference to your application and subsequent interview with us. We are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation}} in {{doc.custom_department}} in Level {{doc.custom_level}} at {{doc.company}} with effect from {{ frappe.format(doc.offer_date, {'fieldtype': 'Date'}) }}.

Certain formalities need to be completed at your end before your joining. Given below is a checklist for your reference. Kindly go through it carefully and arrange to procure the required documents as applicable for submission on or before your joining date. Failing to do so may result in the withdrawal of the offer/termination of the agreement as may be applicable.

Subject: Letter of Intent

  • Educational qualification relevant to job position (Diploma / Graduation mark sheet & certificate)
  • Experience Certificate from current and previous Employer mentioned in the resume
  • Relieving letter from the previous employer
  • Latest Salary Slip / Salary certificate from Last Employer
  • Form 16 from the previous employer
  • 4 Passport size Photographs
  • Residency proof (Rent agreement / Passport / Voter ID / Driving License)
  • PAN Card
  • Passport / Birth Certificate / Class X Certificate
  • Fitness Certificate From Medical Practitioner
  • Police Verification Certificate
  • {{"https://hrms.pauljohnhotels.com/pre-joining-document/new"}}

    • Please note that upon reference check/ background verification/ enquiry, if the Management finds any inconsistency or discrepancy in the particulars and supporting credentials provided by you in your application for employment or thereafter as the case may be, or if the criminal check reveals a concern, the Management shall be free to revoke the offer without further reference to you.

    A detailed letter of appointment with terms and conditions will be issued to you on the date of joining our company.

    Kindly send us the acceptance of the offer at the earliest.

    We look forward to a long and fruitful association with you.

Dear Mr. {{ doc.applicant_name }}

With reference to your application and subsequent interviews you had with us, the management is pleased to appoint you as ‘{% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.designation }}’ in ‘{% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.department }}’ in our organization on {% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.grade }} with effect from {{ doc.appointment_date }} on the following terms and conditions.

1. JOB ASSIGNMENT:
  1. In this position of {% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.designation }} , you will report to the {% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.reports_to }} of the Hotel or the Executive nominated by the management in this behalf.
  2. You are required to perform all tasks that are assigned to you to the best of your ability with all due care and diligence and in compliance with the direction of the management of the Company;
  3. You are required to maintain the highest order of discipline and secrecy as regards the work of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or Associate Companies and ensure compliance with various statutes in your area of operations;
  4. You are required to devote the whole of your attention and abilities exclusively for the business of the Company and shall in all respects obey and conform to the regulations from time to time framed and issued by the Company and applicable to you hence shall not, while in the employment of the Company, be engaged in any other employment, business whatsoever or hold any office of profit or accept any other emoluments without prior consent in writing of the Company.
  5. You are also required to observe and comply with all the rules, regulations, and/or directives of the Company as may be given from time to time, including but not limited to the Company’s Rules and Code of Conduct, which forms an integral part of this Letter of Employment. The Company reserves the right to alter and amend its rules, regulations, and/or directives, and any such alteration or amendment shall become fully effective as a binding term of your employment immediately upon notification. Additionally, you will be governed by the certified standing orders during your employment with the company, as these standing orders shall form part of this contract of employment
2. PROBATION:

You will be on probation initially, for a period of Six months. This probation period is subject to extension from time to time depending upon your performance, attendance, punctuality, character, conduct, and overall suitability which decision is at the sole discretion of the Management. Unless confirmed in writing to you, you will continue to be a probationer.

  1. During probation your services are liable for discontinuance without any reason, notice or payment in lieu of notice.
  2. During probation, in case you desire to discontinue you are required to give one month notice or one month salary and allowances in lieu of notice, since any such discontinuance on your part will dislocate the working to a large extent.
3. COMPENSATION:

Your compensation shall be as given in the Annexure. Your compensation package can be modified/revised by the management at its sole discretion without adversely affecting your total emoluments.

4. DUTY HOURS, SHIFT WORKING, WEEKLY OFFS, LEAVES & HOLIDAYS:

Your hour of work, Shift timings, and weekly offs and holidays will be as per law applicable in this regard and will be intimated to you from time to time.

In case of exigencies of work you shall be required to work beyond your normal working hours and on your weekly off/ holidays which will be in accordance with the provisions of law in this regard.

5. FOOD ON DUTY:

You will be entitled to have an on-duty meal in the staff cafeteria during your duty hours.

6. ACCOMMODATION:

You will be responsible for your own accommodation or as per company policy entitlement in this regards which will be specified in writing to you. If you are provided with company-owned or leased accommodation it is your responsibility to keep the place safe, neat, and clean.

7. STATUTORY BENEFITS:

You will be entitled for all the statutory benefits as per the government norms.

8. TAX:

All applicable Indian taxes on your Compensation and Benefits stated in this appointment letter will be as per subsisting governmental laws as well as any applicable statutory contributions if any, etc. shall be borne and paid entirely by you. The Hotel shall, pursuant to applicable law withhold from any benefit or salary made pursuant to this letter all central, state, municipal, other taxes, contributions, etc as may be required. You will be responsible for the filing and accuracy of all required tax returns in India.

9. LEAVE ENTITLEMENT, NATIONAL & PUBLIC HOLIDAYS

Your entitlement to Privilege Leave, Sick Leave, National and Festival Holidays will be in keeping with the provisions of the applicable statutory legislation in <<City, State>> as well as Hotel policy.

Please note that these holidays and the rules and regulations governing these may be amended from time to time. In view of the nature of the Hotel’s business, the Management reserves the right to substitute alternate days in lieu of the actual Public Holidays on a one-day to one Public Holiday basis. Approval of your immediate reporting authority must be obtained prior to you proceeding on any kind of leave.

10. ADDRESS FOR COMMUNICATION:

You will keep the Management informed of any change in your residential address. In case of your inability to do so, any communication sent at the address available with the Management will be deemed to have been served on you.

11. TRANSFER:

You are initially being appointed as ‘{% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.designation }}’ however you are liable to be transferred at any time on a temporary or permanent basis from one job to another, from one post to another, from one department to another in the establishment, or from one hotel to another, owned, operated or managed by M/s. Paul Resorts & Hotels Pvt. Ltd. or its group companies or its associates in India and abroad. On transfer, you will be governed by the terms and conditions of service of the hotel / resort where you will be posted. The transfer will not deem to constitute a change in your conditions of service.

13. SUPERANNUATION:

You will retire on attaining the age of 60 years

14. MEDICAL EXAMINATION:

Your appointment will be subjected to your producing a Medical Report from the Medical Officer of the establishment appointed for the purpose, testifying to your fitness for work in the establishment from time to time.

15. TERMINATION AFTER CONFIRMATION:

Either party may terminate this contract by serving the other,‘{% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.notice_number_of_days }}’ days notice or salary in lieu of notice.

However, the Company reserves the right to terminate your employment immediately upon written, with or without any notice or salary, in any of the following cases, namely:

If you are guilty of any dishonesty or serious misconduct;

  1. If you breach any term of this Letter of Employment or, without reasonable cause, neglect or refuse to attend to your duties or fail to perform any of the obligations hereunder or fail to observe the Company’s disciplinary rules from time to time in force or any other Company’s regulation;
  2. If you are guilty of any act that may bring discredit or disrepute on the Company;
  3. If you misappropriate assets of the Company; and
  4. When there is reasonable suspicion of misconduct, disloyalty, commission of any act involving moral turpitude, or any act of indiscipline or inefficiency or loss of confidence.
  5. On termination of your employment you must immediately return to the Company all property, documents and items relating to the business of the Company. This includes, but is not limited to any papers, keys, records and documents and other information, in whatever form, relating in any way to the company.
16. REFERENCE CHECKS:

References on your credentials will be obtained from the references provided by you and from your previous employers. If at any time should we receive any adverse references, your services are liable to be terminated

17. ABSENTEEISM:

If you remain absent for more than 8 days without informing your supervisor, obtaining sanction it will be considered that you have abandoned the services and your name will be struck off from Payroll.

18. SAFETY:

The company will not be responsible for any compensation on account of death or injury resulting in partial or total disablement which is directly attributable to your negligence, disobedience, and working under the influence of alcohol or drugs or not following the safety instructions or for any reason not attributable to the resort.

19. CONFIDENTIALITY:

You undertake not to disclose to any person any information which is confidential to the Company, or information with the disclosure of which might be prejudicial to the interest of the Company, including but not limited to marketing information, sales data, trade information, product information, any and all financial information, project schedule status and Company’s proprietary information at any time in the future (except under direct legal obligation) any information you have acquired by virtue of your employment with us as to the Company’s practice, business dealings or affairs, or the affairs of any of the Company’s clients.

This undertaking shall not only apply during the subsistence of this agreement (including any modification hereto) but shall also continue to apply after the termination or expiry of your appointment hereunder (for whatever reasons such as termination or expiry occurs).

Should there be any damages to the Company caused because of any unauthorized disclosure of the company’s proprietary information to third parties, we reserve all rights to seek legal remedies from you and associated parties.

20. OTHER:

We believe that the Company has tremendous potential that provides great opportunities for personal career growth, challenging work and financial rewards. We are confident that you bring to the Company the experience and personal style that will make a positive contribution to our Company.

In the event of the State/Central Government enacting any law conferring the same or similar benefits extended to you under this letter, you would be entitled to the more beneficial of the two, but not both.

We welcome you to ‘{% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.branch }}’ and look forward to a happy association in the years to come

Yours Sincerely,

For {% set unit = frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.employee) %}{{ unit.branch }}

(A Unit of the Paul Resorts & Hotels Pvt. Ltd)
